title: Open Source 3D Assets
description: Discover, customize, and download high-quality 3D assets for games, VR, and 3D projects — all completely free and open source.

hero.title: Open Source 3D Assets
hero.description: A curated collection of high-quality 3D assets including props, environments, and structures — completely free and open source. Built on GLB and glTF standards.

about.title: Find 3D Assets You Can Actually Use
about.description: Open Source 3D Assets helps you discover quality 3D models with clear licensing. Whether you need props for a game, environment assets for VR, or structures for visualization - we've collected 991+ GLB files from talented creators so you don't have to hunt them down yourself.
about.description_2: 991+ assets across 17 themed collections - mostly CC0 (use however you want). We make the licenses crystal clear so you know exactly what you can do.
about.github_description: No gatekeeping. Download directly from our gallery, or if you're a developer, grab our
about.github_description_2: and build your own tools with it.

browse.title: Asset Gallery
browse.description: Browse our extensive collection of 991+ 3D assets with advanced filtering options:

bulletPoints.filter: Filter by collection, theme, and style

inspector.title: 3D Inspector
inspector.description: Advanced tool for analyzing and inspecting 3D asset files:

bulletPoints.geometry: Check polygon count and vertex data

technical.title: Built on Open Standards
technical.vrm_description: GLB is the binary version of glTF (GL Transmission Format), the standard 3D file format for the web and beyond. Think of it as the "JPEG of 3D" - efficient, widely supported, and perfect for real-time rendering.

vrm_features.skeleton: Support for skeletal animations and rigging
vrm_features.materials: PBR materials for realistic cross-platform rendering
vrm_features.vr: Optimized for real-time rendering in games and VR

technical.compatibility_description: GLB assets work seamlessly with major 3D frameworks and engines:

compatibility_items.threejs: Three.js and React Three Fiber for web development
compatibility_items.vrchat: Unity and Unreal Engine for game development

applications.title: Where to Use Our Assets

web.title: Web Development
web.description: Perfect for modern web applications using Three.js, React Three Fiber, and other WebGL frameworks. Ideal for creating interactive 3D experiences on the web.

vr.title: VR & Gaming
vr.description: Ready for Unity, Unreal Engine, and game development. Full support for VR interactions and gaming platforms through standard GLB format.

creative.title: Creative & Visualization
creative.description: Use in architectural visualization, product design, educational content, or creative projects. Perfect for any 3D application.

applications.showcase_description: Discover more amazing applications and platforms using glTF technology in the official showcase.

studio.title: Asset Studio
studio.description: Take screenshots and create videos with customizable backgrounds and lighting for your 3D assets.

editor.title: Material Editor
editor.description: Modify materials and textures for your assets directly in the browser with our built-in editor.

cta.title: Enjoy Free 3D Assets
cta.description: Access a growing collection of CC0-licensed 3D assets built on open standards. Free to use, modify, and share — no strings attached. Start exploring our high-quality models today!
